title: Diligent project management
description: I have experience keeping teams on track and delivering on time in both business and education settings.

title: Strong communicator
description: I enjoy presenting and developing narratives and am comfortable speaking to all levels in a business.

title: Fast learner
description: Part of the Makers experience is learning a lot in a short space of time. Since graduating, I have kept learning at the same pace, making sure to keep broadening my knowledge base.
